clusters.title: Hong Kong’s once-vibrant press stays silent or celebrates Jimmy Lai’s 20-year jail sentence
clusters.neutral_headline: Hong Kongs Jimmy Lai Jailed For 20 Years

items.title: Hong Kong’s once-vibrant press stays silent or celebrates Jimmy Lai’s 20-year jail sentence
items.standfirst: Lack of response shows security law and harassment by authorities have muzzled ‘critical voices’, say expertsThe rise and fall of Jimmy Lai, whose trajectory mirrored that of Hong Kong itselfHong Kong’s once-vibrant media outlets have responded with silence or celebration to the 20-year jail sentence handed down to Jimmy Lai, a pro-democracy media tycoon and critic of the Chinese Communist party.Lai, 78, was sentenced on Monday to 20 years in prison after being convicted of sedition and colluding with foreign forces under Hong Kong’s national security law. The charges were widely seen as being politically motivated and designed to silence one of Hong Kong’s most influential pro-democracy campaigners. Continue reading...
items.content: Lack of response shows security law and harassment by authorities have muzzled ‘critical voices’, say expertsThe rise and fall of Jimmy Lai, whose trajectory mirrored that of Hong Kong itselfHong Kong’s once-vibrant media outlets have responded with silence or celebration to the 20-year jail sentence handed down to Jimmy Lai, a pro-democracy media tycoon and critic of the Chinese Communist party.Lai, 78, was sentenced on Monday to 20 years in prison after being convicted of sedition and colluding with foreign forces under Hong Kong’s national security law. The charges were widely seen as being politically motivated and designed to silence one of Hong Kong’s most influential pro-democracy campaigners. Continue reading...

items.title: Team USA starts to rack up medals at the Winter Games
items.standfirst: Team USA has started to rack up medals at the 2026 Milan Cortina Games. NBC News' Tom Llamas reports on the latest medal count and how Team USA is fairing at the Winter Games. Watch the 2026 Milan Cortina Olympics on NBC and streaming on Peacock.
items.content: Team USA has started to rack up medals at the 2026 Milan Cortina Games. NBC News' Tom Llamas reports on the latest medal count and how Team USA is fairing at the Winter Games. Watch the 2026 Milan Cortina Olympics on NBC and streaming on Peacock.

ai_summary: American athletes are competing at the Winter Olympics
Team USA has started to rack up medals
The 2026 Milano Cortina Winter Olympics are ongoing
Top Team USA competitors are going for gold
The Winter Games are being broadcast on NBC

clusters.title: Plane ends up in ocean after emergency landing - and everyone survives
clusters.neutral_headline: Plane Ends Up In Ocean After Emergency Landing

items.title: Plane ends up in ocean after emergency landing - and everyone survives
items.standfirst: All 55 people on board a passenger plane were safely evacuated after the aircraft overran the runway and ended up in shallow waters during an emergency landing in Somalia.
items.content: All 55 people on board a passenger plane were safely evacuated after the aircraft overran the runway and ended up in shallow waters during an emergency landing in Somalia.

items.title: Pilot praised after crash-landing faulty Somali passenger plane on seashore
items.standfirst: All 55 people on board survived after the plane failed to land on the runway near the shoreline.
items.content: All 55 people on board survived after the plane failed to land on the runway near the shoreline.

ai_summary: A passenger plane ended up in shallow waters
The plane overran the runway during an emergency
All 55 people on board were safely evacuated
The incident occurred in Somalia
The pilot has been praised for the crash landing

clusters.title: Iran tells US not to let Netanyahu thwart nuclear talks before Trump meeting
clusters.neutral_headline: Iran Tells US Not To Let Netanyahu Thwart Talks

items.title: Iran tells US not to let Netanyahu thwart nuclear talks before Trump meeting
items.standfirst: Tehran’s intervention comes as the Israeli prime minister heads to a hastily arranged White House encounterTehran has told the US not to allow Israel to destroy the chance of reaching an agreement over Iran’s nuclear programme amid speculation that Benjamin Netanyahu intends to use a hastily arranged White House meeting with Donald Trump on Wednesday to divert negotiations.Iran’s intervention came as the Israeli prime minister flew to Washington to plead with Trump not to negotiate a deal with Tehran if it excludes limiting the country’s ballistic missile programme, dropping its support for proxy forces in the region and curtailing human rights abuses at home. Continue reading...
items.content: Tehran’s intervention comes as the Israeli prime minister heads to a hastily arranged White House encounterTehran has told the US not to allow Israel to destroy the chance of reaching an agreement over Iran’s nuclear programme amid speculation that Benjamin Netanyahu intends to use a hastily arranged White House meeting with Donald Trump on Wednesday to divert negotiations.Iran’s intervention came as the Israeli prime minister flew to Washington to plead with Trump not to negotiate a deal with Tehran if it excludes limiting the country’s ballistic missile programme, dropping its support for proxy forces in the region and curtailing human rights abuses at home. Continue reading...

items.title: Netanyahu heads to Washington to meet Trump with Iran missiles high on agenda
items.standfirst: Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu headed to Washington Tuesday where he said the top priority in his talks with US President Donald Trump would be the ongoing negotiations with Iran, as he presses for a tougher US approach to Tehran's ballistic missile programme.
items.content: Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu headed to Washington Tuesday where he said the top priority in his talks with US President Donald Trump would be the ongoing negotiations with Iran, as he presses for a tougher US approach to Tehran's ballistic missile programme.

ai_summary: Iran has told the US to not let Israel interfere
Netanyahu is meeting with Trump to discuss Iran
Iran's nuclear program is a key topic of discussion
Netanyahu wants a tougher US approach to Iran
The meeting may impact nuclear negotiations

clusters.title: YouTube Lawyer Sees No Addiction From Half Hour of Videos
clusters.neutral_headline: YouTube Lawyer Discusses Social Media Addiction

items.title: YouTube Lawyer Sees No Addiction From Half Hour of Videos
items.standfirst: The 20-year-old woman at the center of a landmark trial over social media addiction used YouTube for an average of just 29 minutes per day over the last five years, a lawyer for Google told jurors.
items.content: The 20-year-old woman at the center of a landmark trial over social media addiction used YouTube for an average of just 29 minutes per day over the last five years, a lawyer for Google told jurors.

items.title: Instagram and YouTube owners built 'addiction machines', trial hears
items.standfirst: The tech giants are under scrutiny over social media addiction in a landmark jury trial in Los Angeles
items.content: The tech giants are under scrutiny over social media addiction in a landmark jury trial in Los Angeles

ai_summary: A lawyer for Google discussed social media addiction
The lawyer said a user spent 29 minutes on YouTube daily
The tech giants are under scrutiny for addiction
A landmark trial is ongoing in Los Angeles
The trial is examining social media addiction claims
